text: Oh fantastic! Funny enough i grew up in St Albans and went back to live there up until about feb last year so i have a strange fondness for uni of herts deapite not acctually going there!

I think that does split people; groom and cfx seem like they should go well together as a career but groom is so specialised i tend to find its Fx artists who share the most in common (which was my path into it!)

Now i cant recall what you get given when you sign up but do you have my reel and password? And as a quick background: i started at a small vfx house then moved to dneg for a while in Fx, switched to Rewind in St Albans for a year doing Vr, got picked up to create the fur simulation setups for Lion King at MPC then finally moved back down to bournemouth at Outpost where iâ€™ve been accross Fx / Cfx (including another lion haha) and recently started Cg suping a cool new show with, you guessed it, Fx and Cfx!
